span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 赞扬：to mention with approbation: praise
【例】Jason commended his students' studious['studɪəs]用功的 attitude.
【近】approbate, praise, acclaim, applaud, compliment, eulogize, extol
【考法 2】 vt. 托管：to entrust for care or preservation
【例】I commend my fate into your hands.
【近】commit, delegate, deliver, entrust, confide, consign, hand over
【考法 3】 vt. 推荐：to recommend as worthy of confidence or notice
【例】I commend this book to anyone interested in learning more about American history.
【记】 recommend 推荐，推荐别人是因为赞扬，称赞
